description:
A suite of Python scripts to facilitate research data management for High-Content Screens, specifically for supporting EUbOPEN's multiplex assay, depositing in BioImage Archive. This are the Python scripts to download into the "root path" as described in ... 

 

Instructions for use:

  • Download the file "Archive.zip" into your "root path", and unzip it there. 
  • To install the required Python packages, go back to the Anaconda Prompt, and type: 
    • pip install numpy pandas
title: Python scripts for Research Data Management in High-Content Screening

creators.affiliation: Bayer AG; Institute for Globally Distributed Open Research and Education (IGDORE)
creators.name: Giessmann, Robert T.
